title: Account transferred!?
body: When I try to log into my account it says "Your account has transferred to another region. Please try logging in to the appropriate region." I haven't switch regions and I don't know how to fix this. I'm still logged in on the website but really what my account back. Please help.

replies.body: If your account had an unauthorized transfer then it could have been accessed by someone else.  No worries, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our account team can look into this further.  We prefer not to discuss account sensitive information through the boards, but we will help with your specific issue individually.  We'll respond to your ticket asap!
